Description.Details:
Particle Projector Cannons—PPCs—fire streams of energized lightning at their target that deal substantial damage and stability impact. However, this comes with intense heat generation and bulkiness. PPCs also generate a mild EM field that degrades the firing capability of their target.
PPCs can switch off their Field Inhibitor, allowing the weapon to ignore minimum range penalties, but risking a potentially destructive misfire.

Modes.Name: Field Inhibitor OFF
Modes.Description: Disabled Field Inhibitor removes minimum range, but at the chance to misfire.
